about_the_game:
【game Synopsis】

Goldfish Princess of Pet Street is a role-playing, simulation, and development game where you take on the role of the owner of Goldfish Princess, Xiaoli. You must nurture her from a clueless goldfish into a qualified human. By working and investing, you strive to resolve financial crises and even turn the tides to bring the entire Pet Street back from the brink of bankruptcy.

【gameplay Introduction】

a.Development：Arrange weekly lessons for Xiaoli, enhancing her base attributes through the acquisition of knowledge and skills, and strive to become an even more exceptional human being.
b.Part-time Work：
(1).Help out at the fish store by selecting and purchasing fish fry, grow them until they're ready for sale. As Xiaoli was once a goldfish herself, she surely has an innate advantage in taking care of other fish.

(2).Take care of animals in the pet store—feeding, cleaning up after, bathing, walking, and listening to what cats and dogs have to say. With her understanding of animal language, Goldfish Princess Xiaoli is bound to become a great companion for all animals.

(3).Meet new friends and take up part-time jobs at convenience stores, coffee shops, and second-hand bookstores. Engage in a variety of fun mini-games such as organizing shelves, growing vegetables, cooking, and more—all waiting for you to discover!

c.Management：Reach a certain level of proficiency in part-time work at a shop, and you can unlock the management mode! Have Xiaoli rent a shop and become the owner—this is the right way to make big money! Of course, there's a risk of failure if not managed properly.
【Synopsis】
It turns out that the decline of Pet Street is due to the mischief of monsters—go eliminate them! The cards collected in the "overworld" of Pet Street can be used as battle items in the "underworld"?
detailed_description:
【game Synopsis】

Goldfish Princess of Pet Street is a role-playing, simulation, and development game where you take on the role of the owner of Goldfish Princess, Xiaoli. You must nurture her from a clueless goldfish into a qualified human. By working and investing, you strive to resolve financial crises and even turn the tides to bring the entire Pet Street back from the brink of bankruptcy.

【gameplay Introduction】

a.Development：Arrange weekly lessons for Xiaoli, enhancing her base attributes through the acquisition of knowledge and skills, and strive to become an even more exceptional human being.
b.Part-time Work：
(1).Help out at the fish store by selecting and purchasing fish fry, grow them until they're ready for sale. As Xiaoli was once a goldfish herself, she surely has an innate advantage in taking care of other fish.

(2).Take care of animals in the pet store—feeding, cleaning up after, bathing, walking, and listening to what cats and dogs have to say. With her understanding of animal language, Goldfish Princess Xiaoli is bound to become a great companion for all animals.

(3).Meet new friends and take up part-time jobs at convenience stores, coffee shops, and second-hand bookstores. Engage in a variety of fun mini-games such as organizing shelves, growing vegetables, cooking, and more—all waiting for you to discover!

c.Management：Reach a certain level of proficiency in part-time work at a shop, and you can unlock the management mode! Have Xiaoli rent a shop and become the owner—this is the right way to make big money! Of course, there's a risk of failure if not managed properly.
【Synopsis】
It turns out that the decline of Pet Street is due to the mischief of monsters—go eliminate them! The cards collected in the "overworld" of Pet Street can be used as battle items in the "underworld"?
name: 宠物街金鱼姬 Pet Street Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Inter Core ii3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Inter Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Jinyu, also known as Xiaoli, worked on Pet Street to repay her owner's debt as a way of expressing gratitude for the owner's life-saving kindness. During this time, she made various friends and experienced unusual events. As she matured, Jinyu decided to revive the increasingly depressed Pet Street.
